views.markdown:
Version: 1.7.9 - Fix crash on iOS 5 Version: 1.7.8
- Compatibility fix for iPhone 7 models


Version: 1.7.7
- Correct device type detection on iOS 10
Version: 1.7.6
- iOS 10 support
Version: 1.7.5
- Compiled with latest SDK
Version: 1.7-4
- Adjust some override in iOS 9
Version: 1.7-3
- Fix crash in iOS 8

Version: 1.7-1
- iOS 9 support
Version: 1.6-9
- Fix crash bug in iOS 8.
Version: 1.6-8
- Fixed a condition when used with PhotoTorch.
- Removed unnecessary code.

Version: 1.6-7
- (iOS 7, 8) Removed unnecessary code. / Bug in Time-lapse fixed.
Version: 1.6-6
- Fixed crash bug in iOS 8.

Version: 1.6-5
- Optimization and improvement.
Version: 1.6-4
- Updated code.

Version: 1.6-3
- Initial iOS 8 support.
Version: 1.6-2
- Fixed some possible crashing.
Version: 1.5-5
- Bug fixed.

Version: 1.5-4
- Fixed torch toggling bug in iOS 7.1.x

Version: 1.5-3
- Fix missing draggable button in iOS 7.1.x
Version: 1.5-2
- Optimization.
Version: 1.5-1
- Bring back the Draggable Button option for iOS 7!
- Bugs fixed and improvement.
Version: 1.4-9
- Fixed top bar UI glitch when start video recording. (iOS 7)
Version: 1.4-8
- Fixed time elapsed view disappear bug after video recording. (iOS 7)

Version: 1.4-6
- Fixed bug with iOS 7.0.x

Version: 1.4-5
- Fixed Top Bar animation glitch.
- Supported Slo-mo video recording mode in iOS 7.

Version: 1.4-4
- Better Top Bar UI when rotating device while recording video. (With CamRotate installed)
- Flash mode before capture restoring works in iOS 7 now.
- Bugs fixed and improvement.

Version: 1.4-3
- Fixed some bug that causes flash button not showing up in iOS 7
- 64-bit Library included.

Version: 1.4-1
- Supported iOS 7.
- Fixed button positioning bug.
- Fixed bug when restoring flash mode.
- Updated settings.
Version: 1.3-3
- Removed unused files.
- Flash mode before recording video will be restored correctly when finish recording video.
- Removed alert view when set flash to auto mode, described in Settings instead.
Version: 1.3-2
- Supported BiteSMS.

Version: 1.2-13
- Supported iMessages app.
Version 1.2-12
- Compatible with iOS 5
- Redesigned icon.
- Some performance fixed.

Version 1.2-11
- Optimization.
Version 1.2-10
- Performance improved.
Version 1.2-9
- Updated compatibility with Velox.
- Now allows Auto mode in flash button to show when recording video with only "Use Native Button" enabled.

Version 1.2-8
- Button can rotate correctly while recording video with CamRotate 1.0-3+ installed.

Version 1.2-7
- Included bugs fixed and improvement.
Version 1.2-6
- Alert now only displays in rear-facing camera mode.

Version 1.2-5
- Prevent users from setting Torch mode to Auto while recording Video that cause camera to freeze by alerting user.

Version 1.2-4
- Fixed the native flash button disappears when capture still image while recording video.

Version 1.2-3
- Enable using for native flash button while recording, enable from Settings.
- Code reduced and optimization.
Version 1.2-2
- Code Optimization.
Version 1.2-1
- Compatible with Velox.
- Better code
Version 1.1-3
- Refactor code.
Version 1.1-1
- Code optimization.

Version 1.0-9
- More stable.
Version 1.0-8
- Code improvement

Version 1.0-6
- Some leak fixed.

Version 1.0-5
- Fixed button movement in Portrait Upside-down orientation.
- Added supported in iMessages and BiteSMS.
- Button positions now are locked in screen area.
- Some minor changes and bugs fixed.
